channel.title: Runescape Hunger Games | Unique | Dedi | Different
channel.description:
[b][center][img]http://i57.tinypic.com/vo35s6.png[/img]
Download: http://universalx.ddns.net/universalx3/home/RsHGames.jar Website: http://universalx.ddns.net/universalx3/
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/9uqbrq.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/x364ps.png[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2hoflnt.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2i1fcj9.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/mloz00.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/34srzmf.png[/img]
Game Includes:
"You can unlock or buy special kits to help your chances of winning, unlock new perks that increase passive abilities, and fight your way to the top! If you think you have what it takes, then please join, and be prepared to fight for your life!"
"Our server is entirely a mini-game based server, no leveling, and no grinding for hours on end to achieve goals that you might just end up losing anyways!
Sound good? Well continue on reading! Our gameplay concept is based off the Hunger Games, similar to the Minecraft servers, but unique and fun in its own way! - If you don't know what the Hunger Games are, then you should definitely go watch the movie or read the book, you'll love them!"
Trap Chest Free to Play and Pay to Play Kits Team work Death Match Random NPC's Achievements Donor Shop Staff Zone Four Playable Maps Perks Gambling Ester Ring Ring of Stone ClanChat
and ofcourse 100% credits to Peeta for this amazing content.
[/center][/b]

item.description:
@darkburakaya wrote:

Nice mate, it’s really a fun addictive concept and it is executed very well keep it going!

Game Includes:

“You can unlock or buy special kits to help your chances of winning, unlock new perks that increase passive abilities, and fight your way to the top! If you think you have what it takes, then please join, and be prepared to fight for your life!”

"Our server is entirely a mini-game based server, no leveling, and no grinding for hours on end to achieve goals that you might just end up losing anyways!

Sound good? Well continue on reading! Our gameplay concept is based off the Hunger Games, similar to the Minecraft servers, but unique and fun in its own way! - If you don’t know what the Hunger Games are, then you should definitely go watch the movie or read the book, you’ll love them!"
